name: GevoLink
desc: Generate final syntenic gene-set output and condensed syntelog file with GEvo, FeatList, and FastaView links

params.name: data
params.desc: DAGChainer output file with genomic coordinates converted from gene order to nucleotide positions

params.name: dsgid1
params.desc: CoGe's database id for query genome

params.name: dsgid2
params.desc: CoGe's database id for subject genome
